title: 4K - The Passionate People Eater (1960) The flowers that kill in the Spring | Roger Corman

sources.title: 4K - The Passionate People Eater (1960) The flowers that kill in the Spring | Roger Corman
sources.description:
Feed the plant, or face the horror!

The Little Shop of Horrors is a 1960 American horror comedy film directed by Roger Corman. Written by Charles B. Griffith

Seymour finds a mysterious talking plant that demands to be fed, and it brings him fame and success. However, the more the plant eats, the more dangerous it becomes, threatening everyone around him.

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/mj_17y6i4O4


Main actors:
Jonathan Haze - Seymour Krelboined
Jackie Joseph - Audrey Fulquard
Mel Welles - Gravis Mushnick
Dick Miller - Burson Fouch
Jack Nicholson - Wilbur Force
Myrtle Vail - Winifred Krelboined
Sandra De Bear (as Tammy Windsor) - Shirley Plump
Toby Michaels - Barbara Fridl
Leola Wendorff - Mrs. Siddie Shiva
Lynn Storey - Mrs. Hortense Feuchtwanger
Merri Welles - Leonora Clyde
Wally Campo - Sergeant Joe Fink / Narrator

Subtitles are available.
Multi audio tracks.


@CultCinemaClassics
